method: Cook the rainbow pasta as per the package instructions.
In a large pan, sauté the unicorn kale and fairy mushrooms with a tablespoon of magic sauce.
Once the pasta is cooked, drain and add it to the pan.
Mix well and add the remaining magic sauce and stardust spice.
Cook for another few minutes until the flavors are well combined.
Serve the circular saw delight hot and enjoy!
Optional: Garnish with extra stardust spice for an extra magical touch.
